statements: UPDATE bioengineered_plants SET plant_name = 'Rose', species = 'Rosa', genetic_traits = 'Color: red', breeding_program_id = 101 WHERE plant_id = 1;
UPDATE bioengineered_plants SET genetic_traits = 'Resistance: pests, Disease', plant_name = 'Sunflower', species = 'Helianthus annuus', breeding_program_id = 105 WHERE plant_id = 3;
UPDATE bioengineered_plants SET species = 'Modified Species', genetic_traits = 'Enhanced Traits' WHERE plant_id = 1;
UPDATE bioengineered_plants SET breeding_program_id = 2, plant_name = 'Updated Plant' WHERE plant_id = 3;
UPDATE Bioengineered_Plants SET genetic_traits = 'Increased yield, resistance to pests' WHERE plant_id = 1;
UPDATE Breeding_Programs SET lead_scientist = 'Dr. Jane Doe', program_description = 'Focus on crop resilience' WHERE breeding_program_id = 2;
UPDATE Bioengineered_Plants SET genetic_traits = 'Increased resistance to pests' WHERE plant_id = 1;
UPDATE Breeding_Programs SET program_description = 'Focused on developing drought-resistant plants' WHERE breeding_program_id = 3;
UPDATE PlantTraits SET trait_value = 'Healthy' WHERE plant_id = 'a14b6f06-1db7-4e1d-bda5-ad04baa46626';
UPDATE BreedingPrograms SET start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE program_id = '3061e0c6-3f2c-479c-8971-71b0e541931d';
UPDATE PlantTraits SET trait_name = 'Height', trait_value = '10 ft' WHERE plant_id = 'f2055186-5b0e-4369-8f3e-4e140000b379'
UPDATE BreedingPrograms SET start_date = '2023-01-01', end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE program_id = 'a5d9ab46-1bd2-4e2f-82d3-c433d57d413a'
UPDATE Plants SET genetic_traits = 'Improved resistance' WHERE plant_id = 1;
UPDATE BreedingPrograms SET start_date = '2023-01-15', end_date = '2024-06-30' WHERE program_id = 3;
UPDATE Plants SET growth_rate = 0.75 WHERE plant_name = 'Sunflower';
UPDATE PlantTraits SET trait_value = 'Resilient' WHERE plant_id = 1 AND trait_id = 3;
UPDATE PlantTraits SET trait1='Drought Resistant', trait2='Fast Growth' WHERE plant_id=1;
UPDATE GeneticMarkers SET gene_variant='High Yield Variant', marker_name='Growth Marker' WHERE plant_id=2;
UPDATE PlantTraits SET trait1 = 'Unique Trait' WHERE plant_id = 1;
UPDATE GrowthData SET height = 15.6, width = 7.8 WHERE plant_id = 2 AND date = '2022-10-15';
